resources.string: ALBUMS ACTIVITY\nThis activity lists all downloaded albums in a list view. when user clicks on an album, app will start a new activity with downloaded songs of the album.
DISCOVER NEW SONGS AVTIVITY\nIn this activity the user can search for new songs using Last.fm API and purchase them
ARTISTS ACTIVITY\nThis activity lists all user\'s artists. When user clicks on an artist, app will start a new activity with all downloaded songs by the artist.
NOW PLAYING ACTIVITY\nThis activity shows currently playing song with album art and controllers which is handled using MediaPlayer Class
ALL SONGS ACTIVITY\nThis activity lists all downloaded songs with a button to play the song
PAYMENT ACTIVITY\nThis activity will show purchase summary and handle payment using In-app Billing API from Google Play
MAIN ACTIVITY\nlists the different app activities the user can navigate to. also displays the latest downloaded music that plays when clicked on.
